info.description: This is a high level hardware control API for the Vodacomm Telco Kiosks. It serves as a bridge between the Kiosk hardware and the Azimut dynamic dashboards.
info.title: HardwareSDK

get.summary: This API call will return the Device Location and the DealerId.
This API call will return the current status of the hardware present in the Kiosk.

post.summary: This API call generates a transaction id, which will be used accross a single transaction. It also returns the status of hardwares required in the specified flow along with the inventory.

requestBody.description: Object that describes the transaction type and provides the list of Hardware to be used.

transaction_type.description: The transaction type would be provided by Vodacom to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

hardware.description: This param contains the list of hardware which will be   required by Vodacom in there upcoming transaction.

get.summary: This API call will return the current status of the on going pay and dispense call.

post.summary: This API call will perform payment processing of the provided transaction Id. It will further automate the Sim dispensing process based on the payment status.

requestBody.description: This object will recieve the Transaction ID ( previously generated ) and payment amount for the on going transaction.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

amount.description: The price amount that would be charged to the end user.

order_id.description: It would be the order id provided by Vodacom to update into their db.

currency.description: The currency in which payment is made.

post.summary: This API call will cancel the transaction if payment hasn't been done yet.

requestBody.description: This object will recieve the Transaction ID ( previously generated ) for the on going transaction.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

post.summary: This API call will perform payment processing of the provided transaction Id.

requestBody.description: This object will recieve the Transaction ID ( previously generated ) and payment amount for the on going transaction.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

amount.description: The price amount that would be charged to the end user.

currency.description: The currency in which payment is made.

post.summary: This API call will cancel the payment processing of the provided transaction Id.

requestBody.description: This object will recieve the Transaction ID ( previously generated ) and payment amount for the on going transaction.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

post.summary: This API call will return the real time status of  the initiate_payment API call.

requestBody.description: This object will recieve the Transaction ID ( previously generated ) for the on going transaction.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

post.summary: This will move the SimCard to the reading position and return the ICCID if the operation is successful.
This will dispense the sim card to the user.
This will move the sim card to the rejected sim cards pocket.

get.summary: This will return the status of the selected sim card dispenser based on sim_dispenser_id.

parameters.name: sim_dispenser_id
parameters.description: This param will represent the Sim dispenser ID upon which the operation has to be performed. It is due to the possibility of Cascading multiple dispensers to dispense different type of sim cards.

get.summary: This will provide update regarding the UPS status.

post.summary: This will receive capture the image from camera and perform liveness detection on it. The image size would be 640x480 in the JPEG format. It will have the liveness result as EXIF attached to the image.

get.summary: This will return current status of camera.

post.summary: This will start the barcode scanner and waits for certain time period(timeout) for document to be placed on the scanner. After the document has been placed, data will be returned.
This will stop the barcode scanner.

get.summary: This will return the barcode scanner status.

post.summary: This API call will start the document scanner and waits for certain time period(timeout) for document to be placed on the scanner. After the document has been placed, scanned image and the OCR data will be returned.
This will stop the document scanner.

get.summary: This will return the document scanner status.

post.summary: This API call will start the fingerprint reader and waits for certain time period for user thumb based on the timeout value.After the thumb has been placed,it will return the encoded data.
This API call will stop the fingerprint reader.

get.summary: This will return the fingerprint reader status.

post.summary: This will print the receipt based on the input template.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

header_image.description: It will be base64 encoded JPG.

body.description: This array will contain the receipt data in Key:Value pair embeded with the formating tags. Array data type is used to ensure the sequence of K-V pairs. Formatiing tags allowed are : Bold , Italic , Underlined line break

footer.description: It will be simple text string that will be printed at the bottom of the reciept.

get.summary: This will return the printer status.

payment_id.description: This transaction id would be generated by POS as per told by Vodacomm to maintain their financial record.
It is the transaction reference id generated by the POS

additional_fields.description: This will be the transaciton data provided by the payment faciliator.

payment_transaction_id.description: It is the transaction reference id generated by the POS

order_id.description: It would be the order id provided by Vodacom to update into their db.

additional_fields.description: This will be the transaciton data provided by the payment faciliator.

update_order_status.description: This will contain the update order and payment insertion into VCOZA DB status

sim_dispenser_id.description: This param will represent the Sim dispenser ID upon which operation has to been performed.

simcard_depleted.description: Indicates if the pyhsical quantity of sim cards in stacker has exhausted or not

sim_dispenser_id.description: This param will represent the Sim dispenser ID upon which operation has to been performed.

backup_time.description: The backup time is returned in Minutes

image.description: Image is encoded in base64. The format would be JPG.

barcodeData.description: The returned barcode data would be HEX string. It would be the raw data (encoded in base64) which is read from the barcode

document_ocr.description: The data obtained after OCR would be returned as a key:value pair. The number of returned pairs would depend on the document type.

document_image.description: Image is encoded in base64. The format would be JPG.

fingerprint_wsq.description: Scanned fingerprint in WSQ format encoded in Base64

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

sim_dispenser_id.description: This param will represent the Sim dispenser ID upon which the operation has to be performed. It is due to the possibility of Cascading multiple dispensers to dispense different type of sim cards.

transaction_id.description: The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction
The transaction id would be same as the one generated in the initiate_transaction API to enable us catagorizing our data and keeping track of the transaction

timeout.description: Timeout for the device in seconds.
